metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition

requirements.description: This Section applies to sheathing for walls and roofs
requirements.exact_quote: This Section applies to sheathing for walls and roofs

requirements.description: Structural sheathing shall be provided on wood-frame walls and roofs except where alternative bracing is provided
requirements.exact_quote: Structural sheathing shall be provided on wood-frame walls and roofs except where alternative bracing is provided

requirements.description: Plywood sheathing shall conform to CSA O121, CSA O151 or CSA O325
requirements.exact_quote: Plywood sheathing shall conform to CSA O121, CSA O151 or CSA O325
requirements.standard_reference: CSA O121, CSA O151, CSA O325

requirements.description: Minimum plywood roof sheathing thickness for supports spaced not more than 400 mm o.c.
requirements.exact_quote: Plywood roof sheathing shall be not less than 7.5 mm thick for supports spaced not more than 400 mm o.c.

requirements.description: Minimum plywood roof sheathing thickness for supports spaced more than 400 mm but not more than 600 mm o.c.
requirements.exact_quote: 9.5 mm for supports spaced more than 400 mm but not more than 600 mm o.c.

requirements.description: Minimum plywood wall sheathing thickness for studs spaced not more than 400 mm o.c.
requirements.exact_quote: Plywood wall sheathing shall be not less than 6.0 mm thick for studs spaced not more than 400 mm o.c.

requirements.description: Minimum plywood wall sheathing thickness for studs spaced more than 400 mm but not more than 600 mm o.c.
requirements.exact_quote: 7.5 mm for studs spaced more than 400 mm but not more than 600 mm o.c.

requirements.description: OSB sheathing shall conform to CSA O325
requirements.exact_quote: OSB sheathing shall conform to CSA O325

requirements.description: Minimum OSB roof sheathing thickness for supports spaced not more than 400 mm o.c.
requirements.exact_quote: OSB roof sheathing shall be not less than 9.5 mm thick for supports spaced not more than 400 mm o.c.

requirements.description: Minimum OSB roof sheathing thickness for supports spaced more than 400 mm but not more than 600 mm o.c.
requirements.exact_quote: 11.1 mm for supports spaced more than 400 mm but not more than 600 mm o.c.

requirements.description: Minimum OSB wall sheathing thickness for studs spaced not more than 600 mm o.c.
requirements.exact_quote: OSB wall sheathing shall be not less than 9.5 mm thick for studs spaced not more than 600 mm o.c.

requirements.description: Waferboard sheathing shall conform to CSA O437.0
requirements.exact_quote: Waferboard sheathing shall conform to CSA O437.0

requirements.description: Minimum lumber roof sheathing thickness for supports spaced not more than 600 mm o.c.
requirements.exact_quote: Lumber roof sheathing shall be not less than 17 mm thick for supports spaced not more than 600 mm o.c.

requirements.description: Minimum lumber wall sheathing thickness for studs spaced not more than 600 mm o.c.
requirements.exact_quote: Lumber wall sheathing shall be not less than 17 mm thick for studs spaced not more than 600 mm o.c.

requirements.description: Gypsum sheathing shall conform to ASTM C79/C79M or ASTM C1177/C1177M
requirements.exact_quote: Gypsum sheathing shall conform to ASTM C79/C79M or ASTM C1177/C1177M

requirements.description: Minimum gypsum sheathing thickness for studs spaced not more than 600 mm o.c.
requirements.exact_quote: Gypsum sheathing shall be not less than 12.7 mm thick for studs spaced not more than 600 mm o.c.

requirements.description: Fiberboard sheathing shall conform to ASTM C208
requirements.exact_quote: Fiberboard sheathing shall conform to ASTM C208

requirements.description: Minimum fiberboard sheathing thickness for studs spaced not more than 600 mm o.c.
requirements.exact_quote: Fiberboard sheathing shall be not less than 11.1 mm thick for studs spaced not more than 600 mm o.c.

requirements.description: Sheathing paper shall be installed over sheathing that is not water resistant
requirements.exact_quote: Sheathing paper shall be installed over sheathing that is not water resistant

requirements.description: Sheathing paper shall conform to CAN/CGSB-51.32-M
requirements.exact_quote: Sheathing paper shall conform to CAN/CGSB-51.32-M

requirements.description: Minimum horizontal lap for sheathing paper
requirements.exact_quote: Sheathing paper shall be lapped not less than 100 mm at horizontal joints

requirements.description: Minimum vertical lap for sheathing paper
requirements.exact_quote: and not less than 150 mm at vertical joints

requirements.description: Maximum nail spacing at edges of roof sheathing panels
requirements.exact_quote: Nails for roof sheathing shall be spaced not more than 150 mm o.c. at panel edges

requirements.description: Maximum nail spacing at intermediate supports for roof sheathing
requirements.exact_quote: and not more than 300 mm o.c. at intermediate supports

requirements.description: Maximum nail spacing at edges of wall sheathing panels
requirements.exact_quote: Nails for wall sheathing shall be spaced not more than 150 mm o.c. at panel edges

requirements.description: Maximum nail spacing at intermediate supports for wall sheathing
requirements.exact_quote: and not more than 300 mm o.c. at intermediate supports

requirements.description: Minimum distance from nail to edge of sheathing panel
requirements.exact_quote: Nails shall be located not less than 10 mm from the edge of sheathing panels

requirements.description: Gap between edges of adjacent sheathing panels for expansion
requirements.exact_quote: A gap of 2 mm to 3 mm shall be provided between edges of adjacent sheathing panels to allow for expansion
